Class Hardward_Store_Software_Part2

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hardward_Store_Software_Part2

  • public class Hardward_Store_Software_Part2
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the files modification, menu, all the functions the modify the items on the inventory and inventory itself.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) static void addToInventory(java.util.ArrayList<Inventory> list)
      Checks the input ID # against the inventory list, if its there, lets the user choose the complete new quantity, if its not there, gathers all the necessary information to add it to the list
      (package private) static void addUser(java.util.ArrayList<User> users)
      Gathers info to create the User's profile in the system.
      static void completeTransaction(java.util.ArrayList<Transactions> transaction, java.util.ArrayList<User> users, java.util.ArrayList<Inventory> list)
      Gathers necessary info to complete the transaction, and then stores it in the transaction arraylist, while updating the on hand count.
      (package private) static void deleteItem(java.util.ArrayList<Inventory> list)
      Asks the user for the ID number for an item to completely delete from the inventory list.
      (package private) static void displayInventory(java.util.ArrayList<Inventory> list)
      Outputs the item inventory while formating it for the user to read easier
      static void displayTransactions(java.util.ArrayList<Transactions> transaction)
      displays the transaction list of all the sales.
      (package private) static void displayUsers(java.util.ArrayList<User> users)
      Gathers quantity input from user and outputs all items, and their quantities for what is equal too or below that quantity
      (package private) static void itemSearch(java.util.ArrayList<Inventory> list)
      Checks through the inventory for any items that match the provided item or partial name to the item, and returns the current on-hands, prices, and ID number.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Reads in the inventory file, directs the menu, and writes back to the inventory file
      static void updateUser(java.util.ArrayList<User> users)
      Gets the ID of the user that is to be modified, then asks what needs to be modified and does it accordingly

                                       java.util.ArrayList<User> users,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<Inventory> list)

        Parameters:
        users - is the arraylist that data is gathered from
        transaction - arraylist of the transactions that have happened at the store
        list - arraylist of the inventory at the store

      • itemSearch

        static void itemSearch(java.util.ArrayList<Inventory> list)
        Checks through the inventory for any items that match the provided item or partial name to the item, and returns the current on-hands, prices, and ID number.
        Parameters:
        list - the arraylist to the inventory of all the items
